name: Chir Ruewfst
declaringWar: Now you will reap what you have sown.
attacked: We never expected that you could leave us to live in peace. Destruction is in your blood.
defeated: Your legacy is nothing but death.
introduction: So, you have returned! While the world died, what hole did you hide in? The cities you left behind are our inheritance.
hateHello: What will it take? When the last tree has burned and the last child has starved, will you then be satisfied, great leader?
afterPeace: Viracocha has frowned upon our war, and has agreed to our peace agreements.
tradeRequest: This is the property now of the Children. What price will you pay?
uniques: [Civilian] units gain the [Urban Warfare I] promotion
[{Land} {Low Tech}] units gain the [Urban Warfare I] promotion
[Personnel] units gain the [Urban Warfare I] promotion
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
Starts with [Redomestication]
